reasoning: Kawasaki disease incidence varies dramatically by geography (Japan ~250/100k children, Western countries ~10-20/100k). Global weighted average ~8.5 per 100k all-age population based on pediatric incidence data from 2000s.
source: Nakamura Y et al. (2008). Epidemiologic features of Kawasaki disease in Japan. Pediatrics. 122(6):e1167-72
